General.Name: Sky Harbour Group Corporation
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Sky Harbour Group Corporation operates as an aviation infrastructure development company in the United States. The company develops, leases, and manages general aviation hangars for business aircraft. Its home basing hangar campuses includes private and semi-private hangars, as well as a suite of services for home based and transient aircraft. The company is based in White Plains, New York.
General.Address: Westchester County Airport, White Plains, NY, United States, 10604
